SELECT tb.mergeTagId, tb.mergeTagName, tb.basicTagId, tb.basicTagName, tb.`condition`, tb.intro, tb.purpose, tb.state, tb.ctime, tb.utime, tb.remark FROM ( SELECT tb1.id AS mergeTagId, tb1.`name` AS mergeTagName, tb4.id AS basicTagId, tb4.`name` AS basicTagName, tb1.`condition`, tb1.intro, tb1.purpose, tb1.state, tb1.ctime, tb1.utime, tb1.remark FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_merge_tag WHERE state != 6 ) tb1
INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_user_merge_tag_map WHERE 1=1 AND user_id = #{loginUser.id,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) tb2 ON tb1.id = tb2.merge_tag_id
INNER JOIN tbl_merge_tag_tag_map tb3 ON tb1.id = tb3.merge_tag_id INNER JOIN tbl_basic_tag tb4 ON tb3.basic_tag_id = tb4.id ) tb WHERE 1=1
AND tb.state = #{mergeTagBean.state,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND tb.state != 4

SELECT tb.mergeTagId, tb.mergeTagName, tb.basicTagId, tb.basicTagName, tb.userId, tb.`condition`, tb.intro, tb.purpose, tb.state, tb.ctime, tb.utime, tb.remark FROM ( SELECT tb1.id AS mergeTagId, tb1.`name` AS mergeTagName, tb4.id AS basicTagId, tb4.`name` AS basicTagName, tb2.user_id AS userId, tb1.`condition`, tb1.intro, tb1.purpose, tb1.state, tb1.ctime, tb1.utime, tb1.remark FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_merge_tag WHERE state != 6 ) tb1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_user_merge_tag_map WHERE user_id = #{loginUser.id,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) tb2 ON tb1.id = tb2.merge_tag_id INNER JOIN tbl_merge_tag_tag_map tb3 ON tb1.id = tb3.merge_tag_id INNER JOIN tbl_basic_tag tb4 ON tb3.basic_tag_id = tb4.id ) tb WHERE 1=1 AND tb.mergeTagId = #{mergeTagBean.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT DISTINCT tb.mergeTagId, tb.mergeTagName, tb.basicTagId, tb.basicTagName, tb.pid, tb.userId, tb.`condition`, tb.conditions, tb.intro, tb.purpose, tb.state, tb.ctime, tb.utime, tb.remark FROM ( SELECT tb3.id AS mergeTagId, tb3.`name` AS mergeTagName, tb5.id AS basicTagId, tb5.`name` AS basicTagName, tb5.pid, tb1.id AS userId, tb3.`condition`, tb4.id, tb4.conditions, tb3.intro, tb3.purpose, tb3.state, tb3.ctime, tb3.utime, tb3.remark FROM ( SELECT * FROM tbl_user WHERE id = #{loginUser.id} ) tb1 INNER JOIN tbl_user_merge_tag_map tb2 ON tb1.id = tb2.user_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_merge_tag WHERE state != 6 ) tb3 ON tb3.id = tb2.merge_tag_id INNER JOIN tbl_merge_tag_tag_map tb4 ON tb3.id = tb4.merge_tag_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_basic_tag WHERE state != 6 ) tb5 ON tb5.id = tb4.basic_tag_id ) tb WHERE tb.mergeTagId = #{mergeTagBean.id,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY tb.id
